statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT consumption, timestamp FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption > 100;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM energy_consumption WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT AVG(consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT id, timestamp, consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2021-03-31' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, AVG(consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY id HAVING avg_consumption > 50 ORDER BY avg_consumption DESC;
SELECT MIN(consumption) AS min_consumption, MAX(consumption) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY id HAVING num_records >= 5 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT user_id, consumed_power, consumption_date FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY consumed_power DESC;
SELECT user_id, consumed_power FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumed_power > 100;
SELECT generated_power, generation_date FROM HydropowerGeneration ORDER BY generation_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(consumed_power) AS total_consumed_power FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, consumed_power FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY consumed_power DESC
SELECT AVG(consumed_power) AS avg_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumed_power > 100 ORDER BY consumption_date ASC
SELECT e.user_id, e.consumption_date, e.consumed_power, h.generated_power FROM EnergyConsumption e JOIN HydropowerGeneration h ON e.consumption_date = h.generation_date
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT consumer_id, consumption_amount FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY consumption_amount DESC;
SELECT generation_id, generation_amount, generation_date FROM hydropower_generation WHERE generation_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM optimization_schedule WHERE optimization_date >= '2022-01-01' AND optimization_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT schedule_id, generation_amount, consumption_amount FROM optimization_schedule JOIN hydropower_generation ON optimization_schedule.generation_id = hydropower_generation.generation_id JOIN energy_consumption ON optimization_schedule.consumer_id = energy_consumption.consumer_id;
SELECT consumer_id, consumption_amount, consumption_date FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY consumption_date DESC
SELECT generation_id, generation_amount, generation_date FROM hydropower_generation WHERE generation_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM hydropower_generation ORDER BY generation_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM optimization_schedule WHERE generation_id = 3 ORDER BY optimization_date
SELECT customer_id, consumption_amount, timestamp FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT generation_id, generation_amount, timestamp FROM hydropower_generation ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM power_plants WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM hydropower_schedules WHERE schedule_id > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT generation_id, timestamp FROM hydropower_schedules INNER JOIN hydropower_generation ON hydropower_schedules.generation_id = hydropower_generation.generation_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, consumption_amount FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_amount > 100;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM power_plants WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT generation_id, timestamp FROM hydropower_generation WHERE generation_amount > 5000 ORDER BY generation_amount DESC;

SELECT hydropower_schedules.schedule_id, hydropower_generation.generation_amount FROM hydropower_schedules INNER JOIN hydropower_generation ON hydropower_schedules.generation_id = hydropower_generation.generation_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT PlantName, Location FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants;
SELECT Date, EnergyGenerated FROM EnergyGenerationSchedule WHERE EnergyGenerated > 1000;
SELECT Temperature, Precipitation, WindSpeed FROM WeatherForecast WHERE Date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT PlantID, Date, EnergyGenerated FROM EnergyProductionHistory ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY Date DESC, Time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT EnergyGenerated, Date FROM EnergyGenerationSchedule WHERE EnergyGenerated > 1000 AND Date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT PlantName, Location FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants WHERE Capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY PlantName ASC;
SELECT Date, Temperature, Precipitation FROM WeatherForecast WHERE Temperature > 25 AND Precipitation < 0.5 ORDER BY Date ASC;
SELECT PlantID, Date, EnergyGenerated FROM EnergyProductionHistory WHERE PlantID = 3 AND Date < '2022-07-01' ORDER BY Date DESC LIMIT 5;
